structure.unit: ARTICLE CXVI. NORTHEAST DADE AREA MUNICIPAL ADVISORY COMMITTEE

text.section:
Sec. 2-1762. Purposes.
To review the possible incorporation of the generally described area:
To prepare an advisory report that shall address the results of the study prepared by County staff as well as incorporation concerns of members of the Board of County Commissioners and the manner in which those concerns may be alleviated in the event Northeast Dade Area is incorporated as a new municipality.
